short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes YouTube Shorts content from the video feed with toggle functionality

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Remove YouTube shorts, focus on what you truly want to focus on.

This extension allows you to remove YouTube Shorts from your recommended video feed. Enjoy a cleaner experience without the unwanted bloatware.

 NoShorts is completely free, does not collect or sell any of your data, does not require logins or signups, is as simple and efficient as possible and works with a single click, one toggle is all you need.
